description: 2022 is already there, and with it new Stormbound release with balance tweaks, and the long awaited draft mode!
December is already there, and with it new Stormbound release with a new card, balance tweaks, level caps and a lot of exclusive offers and bonuses!
November is already there, and with it new Stormbound release with new cards, new books, balance tweaks and a deck/import export functionality!
October is already there, and with it new Stormbound release with new Ancient cards, Brawl modifiers and balance tweaks!
There is a new Ironclad guide by IMM0RT4L’s on their deck ‘Mia’s Metropolis’!
There is a new guide on using and countering structures, courtesy of redsnake_25!
September is already there, and with it new Stormbound release with plenty offers, a new card and balance tweaks!
Pepegak wrote a complete guide to master the art of Blessed with Brawn Rush.
The stories now has an index page to list all the various categories from the section.
The fan-kit now has an index page to list all the various categories from the section.
August is already there, and with it new Stormbound release with new Brawls, a new card and balance tweaks!
ArthisRoo creates a tier list of all legendary cards at level 1 and briefly examines each one.
July is already there, and with it new Stormbound release with new Brawls, a new card and balance tweaks!
A small and useless new tool made its entrance: the book opening simulator!
A small surprise release is out with some revamped Brawl!
June is already there, and with it new Stormbound release with new cards, balance tweaks and economy improvements!
All the backgrounds, with and without arenas, are now available in the fan-kit!
All the avatars, free and exclusive, are now available in the fan-kit!
May is already there, and with it new Stormbound release with new cards, balance tweaks, Heroes League improvements and a brand new Premium Pass!
The infamous Discord Stormbound trivia is now available on the site as well!
It’s about Easter, and with it a new Stormbound release with new cards, balance tweaks, Heroes League improvements and some exclusive offers!
Heroes, assemble! The Heroes League is about to open its doors, and with it endless rewards and battles!
Valentine’s Day is around the corner, and so is a new release with balance changes, a new card and player profiles!
A new Swarm of the East epic structure is making its entrance: the Temple of Focus!
A critical iOS update impacting guest accounts will happen on January 21st. Save your progress!
Christmas and New Year’s Eve are approaching and with them a new small patch with rewards!
Thanksgiving is approaching and with them a new small patch with rewards!
RecklessRush wrote an entire guide on playing his eponymous deck to perfect!
There is a new Brawl calculator to plan your Brawl journey!
Halloween is around the corner and with it a new small patch with goodies!
The deck builder and collection manager now have an advanced card search for power users.
Stratadox expands on why Green Prototypes is the most versatile card in the game.
The value calculator aims at putting a number of a given card based on its properties.
There is now an index listing all Stormbound-Kitty content creators and contributors!
The second Sheepyard update is here, so be sure to read everything you need to know!
The member pages have been reworked to display a feed of information about a player.
A new page displaying Stormbound fan art is now available!
The tournament Hall of Fame has been reworked to provide more information.
A minor promotional update on the 17th of September to celebrate Stormbound’s 3rd anniversary!
The Brewed Sages podcast by Freeloader and Subaiku now has its own page where you can listen to all episodes!
A minor buff patch is landing, so be sure to check it out!
The site navigation has been entirely revamped to make finding content more convenient.
Be sure to check the brand new Broodmother Qordia guide by HyperScrub.
There is now a page for the Tournaments hall of fame.
Be sure to check the brand new Terrific Slayers guide by Dracqi.
Be sure to check the brand new Chillbeards guide by Dracqi.
The income calculator now provides an option to convert rubies to Mythic Tomes, Heroic Tomes or Classic Tomes.
The collection stats now provides additional information to measure missing card copies per rarity.
A brand new beginner’s guide on the Brawl has been released.
A list of the known bugs and their potential causes and fixes has been released.
It is now possible to search the whole site for content (metakey + k for shortcut).
There is now a brand new income calculator up-to-date with the July release.
The Card Shop section of the guide on resources has been split into its own guide by Oeni.
The card changelog has been revisited to be more accurate and more easily searchable.
Personal decks can now be ordered by name, and they can have custom categories.
Discover everything there is to know about the first Stormbound update from the Sheepyard studio!
Check out the brand new page if you’d like to know more and help!
Derk and Kitty joined to write a guide on triggers (death, survive, attack…) and demystify the resolution order.
It is now possible to bookmark a deck directly from the deck builder.
There is a new guide on reaching Diamond 1 with a Shadowfen deck made mostly of common cards.
There is a new guide on demystifying the mana curve and learning how to read the grap.
The mana-curve visualisation now can display mana-Brawl variations as well.
Mana-Brawl decks now display the adjusted mana cost of their cards.
A lot of deck advice have been adjusted to be more realistic and informative.
The resource guide now contains an entire section on using the Card Shop.
The deck advice page now illustrates the mana curve of a deck visually.
Learn everything there is to learn about resources in this new guide by Roman!
The deck advice have been improved and should now warn about inefficient cards and lack of finishers.
Learn everything there is to learn about the drawing mechanics in the brand new guide!
You can now manage your Brawl progress, expenses and performance in the Brawl tracker.
You can now manage your decks directly on the site with the deck collection!
The featured decks can now be sorted by most recently added, faction or feasibility.
The card builder now offers a way to quickly load an official card.
The stories section has been redesigned and showcase the new Eastern Heat saga from Zyries.
The dry-runner now provides a log of recently played cards, just like in the game.
Stormbound-Kitty now provides a changelog of all cards additions and updates, courtesy of the official Wiki.
Stormbound-Kitty now provides some data visualisation about the Stormbound card collection.
Stormbound-Kitty now provides a fan-kit with all the images from the game.
Featured decks show card levels from your collection and are ordered accordingly.
Opening official cards in the card builder with a loaded collection display the upgrade progres bar like in game.
When filtering collection by excess copies, cards will be ordered by most locked coins to least.
It is now possible to find the odds of pulling fusion stones and coins from books.
The card collection now offers handy stats and data visualisation about your cards.
It is now possible to find the odds of pulling a certain card from a book with the books calculator.
It is now possible to sort the card collection by card value.
The collection now informs how much coins would the excess copies bring after the Brawl update.
The Elders and the Brawl update balance changes are here!
The featured decks no longer have tags, but a new filter by author feature is available.
The Stories section has been divided in sub-sections per categories.
The site’s code is now available on GitHub (under GPL-3.0).
The deck builder now providers a (smart) random deck generator.
It is now possible to create tier lists of cards with the new tier list builder!
Discover the new feline card exclusively on Stormbound-Kitty! 🐱
Many thanks to MooreFunn for authoring a guide to play pirates!
The winner of the weekly card contest will receive a random epic card in game!
All 5 new feline cards have been added to the site.
The Card Contest page now displays the Hall of Fame of previous winning cards.
Stories are now first-class citizens and replace the quest builder in the top navigation.
All changes from the May update are now published: new cards, existing cards’ update, new upgrade costs, new copies requirements.
The CSV file should now look decent when opened in a third-party software such as Excel.
Some existing cards now display community-authored stories in the card builder.
The filters for the collection view are now more suited for it (faction, status and level).
The 5 new cards from the upcoming update are now available.
The complete Stormbound guide by Arikrat is now available on the site!
Decks can now be exported as images to be shared more easily.
It is now possible to import and export card collections.
Cards can now be selected with keys 1 to 4, played with “P”, cycled with “C” and the turn can be ended with “E”.
The card builder now has a display mode to hide the editing interface.
The desktop version of the simulator will now load a random background.
The site’s footer has been redesigned to provide more information and offer a way to make a small donation.
It is now possible to dry-run equal decks by clicking “Reset game” and checking “Reset in equal levels”.
Updating the level of a card in the deck can be done by re-adding the card with a different level.
